Package com.camerontec.catalys.util.recovery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRecoverable
    Interface defining a class which is recoverable - that is, capable of replaying a set of data to an IRecoveryProcessor.
    IRecoveryManager
    Standard interface for any object that starts and manages a recovery.
    IRecoveryProcessor
    Standard interface to be supported by any class that processes recovered transactions.
    IRecoveryRecord
    Interface to be implemented by concrete recovery record implementations.
    IRecoveryService
    Interface to be implemented by concrete recovery service implementations.
    ITransactionLog
    Transaction log which can be used for recovery.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LogRecoveryManager
    RecoverManager for handling recovery from a transaction log.
    RecoveryManager
    Wraps up a recovery in a lock which can be wait'ed on.
    TransactionLogOnFile
    Transaction log written to a file.
